wikipedia_page.main: Cyril Henry Spiers (4 April 1902 – 21 May 1967) was an English association football goalkeeper who played for Aston Villa, Tottenham Hotspur and Wolverhampton Wanderers. He later went on to manage at Football League clubs for more than twenty years.

response: *Cyril Spiers (1902–1967), former English professional footballer and manager
